content.text:
# Draft:Not My Presidents Day (2025)

Not My Presidents Day, also known as '''Not My President's Day or Not My Presidents' Day''', was a series of protest held on February 17, 2025, the Washington's Birthday. Protests were held against the president of the United States Donald Trump and Elon Musk, one of the senior advisors to the president. The protest was part of the 50501 movement and occurred in numerous cities in the United States.
Locations
Western United States
Over 400 people gathered outside the Alaska State Capitol in Juneau to protest against Trump's cut on federal employees, deporting refugees and impolite attitude towards LGBTQ+ community. Another 250 people attended a rally in Petersburg. Protests also occurred in Anchorage, Palmer, Homer, Fairbanks, Kodiak, and Ketchikan.
About 2,000 people joined the protest outside the Washington State Capitol in Olympia. Another protest was held at the Cal Anderson Park in Seattle.
